ygData.subject: Re: Tentacle Whip
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, the thing I liked about the 10-tickle whip was the proc message: ... beams a a smile...  or is it ... ahh ...feels better... or is it both?  The proc
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, the thing I liked about the 10-tickle whip was the proc message:

'... beams a a smile...' or is it "... ahh ...feels better..." or is it
both? The proc is Life tap? Necro bard hehe!

For me it was more for fun. Your BLW is a better wep. Ashenwood short
spear is good wep for the 20ish levels. Less weight, as good or better
ratio. Has 10 charges of haste (never used any of mine). Looking to your
30's I'd suggest Staff o' Writhing and Obsidian Shard (SoWr 48dd proc; OSh
30dd proc). I used SoWr and Dirk for a long time. Should have gotten that
OSh lots sooner. By level 45 you want to be 2YK compliant but that's a
really hard prize to earn without some good (guild) help.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <Mike.Langlois@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 5:10 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Tentacle Whip


> From: Mike.Langlois@...
>
>
>
> I noticed that during the Dual Wield thread, some of you fine Bards said
that
> you use a Tentacle Whip.
>
> Do you feel that the low delay makes it viable? Have you seen the proc
> damage/heal be enough to be attractive?
